about_the_game:
"NOTE" from 3.6.2024
The new demo cannot be uploaded today 3rd of June but will be uploaded earliest in 3 days from today.

The narrative is easy: You got abducted and are now competing in an alien gladiatorial TV game show. In order to get back to earth, beat the game show and win the price of freedom.

As a human bring mayhem and entertain the alien audience in the bloodiest game show the galaxy has ever seen!
Progress with each run, earn credits, buy your arsenal and perks you start out with until you beat the show and are allowed to return to earth!

- pile up the corpses to build ramps and navigate the maze
- entertain the audience with the bloodiest gameplay you are able to deliver and earn yourself a fortune
- solve ever new generated mazes and objectives and meet thousands of enemies that all want to kill you

-----

The game is currently under development and we plan to go into early access as soon as major bugs and plot killers are fixed.

So if you encounter any bugs or want to contribute with ideas or feedback, please be sure to join our discord

You will be able to create bugreports or send feedback via our codecks integration. Find the instructions in the pinned post in the feedback channel.

If you want to directly view feedback to our public feedback board, find our codecks account here:


-----

In this demo, you played 2 stages with only 2 different objectives.

The final game will consist of 10 different stages plus two boss stages.
All stages will have unique objectives the player has to solve.

We will offer 4 different Characters to choose from and we even plan for a 4 player Coop.

Have a great day and perhaps cu soon on our Discord server!

The Giant Gun Games Team

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a gory shooter that features a lot of blood when shooting and defeating the enemies.

detailed_description:
"NOTE" from 3.6.2024
The new demo cannot be uploaded today 3rd of June but will be uploaded earliest in 3 days from today.

The narrative is easy: You got abducted and are now competing in an alien gladiatorial TV game show. In order to get back to earth, beat the game show and win the price of freedom.

As a human bring mayhem and entertain the alien audience in the bloodiest game show the galaxy has ever seen!
Progress with each run, earn credits, buy your arsenal and perks you start out with until you beat the show and are allowed to return to earth!

- pile up the corpses to build ramps and navigate the maze
- entertain the audience with the bloodiest gameplay you are able to deliver and earn yourself a fortune
- solve ever new generated mazes and objectives and meet thousands of enemies that all want to kill you

The game is currently under development and we plan to go into early access as soon as major bugs and plot killers are fixed.

So if you encounter any bugs or want to contribute with ideas or feedback, please be sure to join our discord

You will be able to create bugreports or send feedback via our codecks integration. Find the instructions in the pinned post in the feedback channel.

name: Maze Slaughter Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Maze Slaughter a first person rogue-lite shooter.Think of Running Man meets Serious Sam in an alien gladiatorial TV game show, where the player utilizes the enemy corpses to solve the stages.
